languages.text: "Нет. Уберите труп. Проверьте сохранность зерна: возможно, погибший успел употребить что-то до смерти. Нужно знать размеры недостачи".
"No. Remove the body. Check that the grain is all accounted for — the victim could have consumed some of it before death. Calculate the shortage."
languages.original_text: "Нет. Уберите труп. Проверьте сохранность зерна: возможно, погибший успел употребить что-то до смерти. Нужно знать размеры недостачи".

traits.locale_text: "No. Remove the body. Check that the grain is all accounted for — the victim could have consumed some of it before death. Calculate the shortage."
"No. Remove the body. Check that the grain is all accounted for — the victim could have consumed some of it before death. Calculate the shortage."
"No. Remove the body. Check that the grain is all accounted for — the victim could have consumed some of it before death. Calculate the shortage."
"No. Remove the body. Check that the grain is all accounted for — the victim could have consumed some of it before death. Calculate the shortage."
"No. Remove the body. Check that the grain is all accounted for — the victim could have consumed some of it before death. Calculate the shortage."
"No. Remove the body. Check that the grain is all accounted for — the victim could have consumed some of it before death. Calculate the shortage."

languages.text: «No. Aparte el cuerpo. Compruebe cuánto trigo queda; la víctima podría haber consumido parte antes de morir. Calcule la diferencia».
languages.original_text: "No. Remove the body. Check that the grain is all accounted for — the victim could have consumed some of it before death. Calculate the shortage."

traits.locale_text: «No. Aparte el cuerpo. Compruebe cuánto trigo queda; la víctima podría haber consumido parte antes de morir. Calcule la diferencia».

languages.text: “不用，把尸体挪走，检查一下谷物是否完好无损。死者可能在死前吃掉了一部分谷物，算一下缺了多少。”
languages.original_text: "No. Remove the body. Check that the grain is all accounted for — the victim could have consumed some of it before death. Calculate the shortage."

traits.locale_text: “不用，把尸体挪走，检查一下谷物是否完好无损。死者可能在死前吃掉了一部分谷物，算一下缺了多少。”

languages.text: 「いや。死体を取り除け。穀物がすべてあるか確認しろ、そいつが死ぬ前にいくらか食べてしまったかもしれないからな。不足分を計算しろ」
languages.original_text: "No. Remove the body. Check that the grain is all accounted for — the victim could have consumed some of it before death. Calculate the shortage."

traits.locale_text: 「いや。死体を取り除け。穀物がすべてあるか確認しろ、そいつが死ぬ前にいくらか食べてしまったかもしれないからな。不足分を計算しろ」

languages.text: "Nein. Bringt die Leiche weg. Und seht zu, dass das gesamte Getreide inventarisiert wird ... das Opfer könnte vor seinem Tod etwas davon verschluckt haben. Berechnet den Fehlbestand."
languages.original_text: "No. Remove the body. Check that the grain is all accounted for — the victim could have consumed some of it before death. Calculate the shortage."

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Bringt die Leiche weg. Und seht zu, dass das gesamte Getreide inventarisiert wird ... das Opfer könnte vor seinem Tod etwas davon verschluckt haben. Berechnet den Fehlbestand."

languages.text: « Non. Contentez-vous d'enlever le corps. Vérifiez que le stock de grain est au complet, la victime a pu en consommer une partie avant de mourir. Le cas échéant, tâchez d'évaluer la quantité manquante. »
languages.original_text: "No. Remove the body. Check that the grain is all accounted for — the victim could have consumed some of it before death. Calculate the shortage."

traits.locale_text: « Non. Contentez-vous d'enlever le corps. Vérifiez que le stock de grain est au complet, la victime a pu en consommer une partie avant de mourir. Le cas échéant, tâchez d'évaluer la quantité manquante. »

languages.text: "Hayır. Cesedi kaldırın. Ayrıca tahılın tamamı sayılsın. Ölmeden önce bir kısmını tüketmiş olabilir. Eksik miktar hesaplansın."
languages.original_text: "No. Remove the body. Check that the grain is all accounted for — the victim could have consumed some of it before death. Calculate the shortage."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır. Cesedi kaldırın. Ayrıca tahılın tamamı sayılsın. Ölmeden önce bir kısmını tüketmiş olabilir. Eksik miktar hesaplansın."
